moves.1. e4: Usual start for me...I know tag ... he is going to play d5 as usual ,
moves.2. e5: Echange the pawns and the queen comes out , possiblt wreaking havoc..lets keep it tied up for the time being.
moves.2... c5 3. d4 cxd4 4. Qxd4: Not to keen on this queen move only way to re-capture , but it will beocme a target now
moves.5... e6: As expected..defending pawn and opening up diagonal to develop bish
moves.6... Nc6: here we go...knew this queen had come out too early !
moves.7. Qf4: Has to saty somewhere where it can protect e5
moves.8... h6: Maybe worried I would move queen to g5 , but I hadnt thought of that !
moves.9. Bd3 Be7 10. O-O b5 11. Ne2: Worried about P-b4 , so moving to safety
moves.11... g5: hmmm...not sure about this one tag mate ! chases my queen , but weak kingside defences and a nice open diagonal...will I manage to take advantage? lets see
moves.12. Qe3 Bb7 13. Nfd4: This was a mistake..have removed a defender of pawn on e5 , now I am going to lose it
moves.13... Bc5: But maybe not yet..cos he wants to tie me up with this pin 1st
moves.14. c3: Needs extra protection or I lose it
moves.14... O-O-O: Intersting choice of move. Cant go Kingside cos of opne diagonal , but Im now looking at this nice file with K and Q together with no black pawns in front
moves.15. b4: Hoping for bishop for knight exchange to open up that file for me
moves.15... Bb6: Damn , he knows what I am after and wont do it !
moves.16. Bb2: This diagonal looks tasty..Im sure something good will come of this later...
moves.16... Nxe5: There goes my pawn..couldnt hold it..pawn down against tag usually means a loss..my record against him isnt so good
moves.17. a4: tryin to break open his defences
moves.17... Nxd3 18. Qxd3 e5 19. axb5: what am I doing ..this loses me a knight !
moves.20. bxa6: but I now have a nasty thorn in his side with this pawn!! hee hee
moves.20... Bc6 21. Rfc1: put a bit of pressure on this file that I have had my eye on for a while
moves.21... Ne7 22. b5: pressure is on now..move that bishop off this rank.. take pawn on d4 and its looking good for me...lets see
moves.23. Bxc3: now I at least win my piece back if not more
moves.23... Kd7: good idea to get king off that rank , but I am now attacking rook, and bishop and got a passed pawn..the end is nigh !
moves.24. bxc6+: regains my lost piece and I am also about to win the rook too
moves.24... Nxc6 25. Bxh8 Rxh8 26. Qxd5+: flurry of exchanges leaving me a nice advantage and still a nice thorn in side of a pwan..
moves.26... Ke7: No way of saving the Knight either
moves.27. Qxc6 Bxf2+: I take it this means u give up then?
moves.28. Kxf2 Qa7+ 29. Qc5+: forces the exchange of queens...which would leave me a simple end game , but  enough is enough and I score a rare win against my nemesis
